website_summaries.verdict: With boosted bass response, a heart rate sensor, and a waterproof design, the Jabra Elite Sport is a quality wire-free earphone pair aimed at athletes and exercise buffs.
pros: Powerful audio performance with boosted bass
HearThrough lets you to monitor your surroundings while listening to audio
Built-in heart rate sensor and accelerometer
cons: Audio not for those seeking a crisp, defined response

customer_reviews.title: Battery life decreases after a year and the headphones don't link correctly.
customer_reviews.text: I have had these headphones a year and a half and they were brilliant. Over the past few months I have had to resort to an older pair of Beats headphones as my Jabra earbuds have not been working correctly. Firstly the charge now only lasts 2 hours maximum. The left earbud is completely useless as it does not connect to the right earbud unless it is directly next to it and therefore playing music with both earbuds in does not work. To begin with they were brilliant headphones but long term clearly not perfect sadly.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: not great, have been e-mailing Jabra for over a month ...
customer_reviews.text: not great, have been e-mailing Jabra for over a month to fix it and not they are asking me to send it back to them for a replacement. Wish i sent it back within 14 days.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lim

customer_reviews.title: COUNTERFEIT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: From day 1 I struggled with battery life, connectivity and no way of using these for what was a USP, the heart rate monitor. After weeks of correspondence with Jabra tech support they determined that upon recipe tof several photos of my earphones and charging case the product is counterfeit.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian Janes

customer_reviews.title: Jabra Eilte Sport - can't charge, problems availing of warranty / response from support
customer_reviews.text: Haven't been able to consistently charge the buds since purchase, so unusable (tried just about everything). Currently trying to have them replaced but having an equally bad experience with Jabra support - failing to respond to repeated requests for an update.
customer_reviews.author: le_peeps

customer_reviews.title: It's very nice and the sound quality is very clear
customer_reviews.text: It's very nice and the sound quality is very clear .. I've reviewed this on YouTube and I do not regret my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery
customer_reviews.text: Battery won’t last an hour when it supposed to last more than 3...
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Vargas Pires

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Its early days but they have totally exceeded my expectations. I was expecting a good sound but for wireless earbuds they are the best I have ever heard, pricy but then I guess thats what you pay for. Would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Timbo

customer_reviews.title: Ok for this type of earbud but wouldn't stay in my ears
customer_reviews.text: Sound and pairing are ok. Battery life is only a couple of hours but that is typical of this type of earbud. But regardless of what I tried I could not get them to stay in my ears
customer_reviews.author: strthnt@aol.com

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised....
customer_reviews.text: I had been watching these for a while and accepted the sound quality would be worse than my bose but traded off the size for a slight drop in sound, when they rot ear had discharged I put it in the case for recharge, but the found it didn't have pins, to allow contact, to the earphone, claimed against warrant, but instead of exchange Jabra are insisting I wait even longer, not for a replacement, but apparently so they can repair them, I know have to decide if I me willing to gamble on them being fixed or just return them as the poor product they appear to be, not what I expect for a £200 pair of earphones.....
customer_reviews.author: Tom Crawley

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, poor execution
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for these but they were so unusable I had to send them back. They simply would not stay in play and always felt ready to fall out, regardless of which fittings I used. They are also fiddly and sound quality is average (or mostly poor since they don't stay in place, so always sound bad due to the failure to seal into the ear canal). I am hoping some future generation of these or another similar model is much better since the idea is brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: M. Dooley

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The ear buds will not charge at all when in the case, they're only 4 weeks old ! Amazon customer service is amazing though- next day delivery on a replacement pair. I'm going to give them one last try - will return if it happens again.
customer_reviews.author: LPS

customer_reviews.title: Good idea but not good enough..
customer_reviews.text: I was dying to buy these but was not willing to pay 200+, finally they were on sale. Now I don't mind money on items that are fit for purpose, i was hoping this was but it wasnt: - kept falling out ear - left ear didnt work for reason Just to be clear i do crossfit so i need something that sticks in my ear. Real shame because the idea is brilliant! Maybe next model will be better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only suitable for small ears
customer_reviews.text: Great concept and execution but unfrotunately the ear gels are custom made and even though there are 3 different sizes they are shorter and smaller than what is offered by most other brands, so for me it was impossible to get a tight contact with my ears, which render the headphones unusable. Have to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas Dickreuter

customer_reviews.title: Faultless!
customer_reviews.text: Been using these for a few months now. Can't fault them at all! The only slight negative is they could probably be a little smaller but this is soon forgotten.
customer_reviews.author: LJG7777

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of kit. Does what it say's on the box. Expensive but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Nigel Posnett

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing, for the price
customer_reviews.text: You should already know that the battery life is short. But this isn't really a problem because you have a charging case. Pros: Okay sound quality (not too bass-heavy) HR scanner works App, for outdoor activities Cons: Poor sound quality for the price Not a great fit for me (yes, I've seen the videos and guides) Poor isolation App is useless for general indoor gym use Unreliable charger case Left earpiece sometimes disconnects (firmware up to date)
customer_reviews.author: X21

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade from Jabra Sport Pulse
customer_reviews.text: What more could you want from a pair of headphones. Rep counter, heart rate monitor and fantastic sound. Battery life is around 2.5-3 hours, with the case carrying an extra 6 hours worth of charge. Your right earbud is the main one, so if you take your left one out it automatically turns off. Fitting is ok, the foams work well as do the wings. Takes a little playing around to find which set is suited best to you. LEDs let you know about the battery status of each earbud and the case itself.
customer_reviews.author: Charles F.

customer_reviews.title: Great set of Bluetooth earbuds for training.
customer_reviews.text: They stay in your ears no problem,even when running fast down hill off-road. Easy to forget your wearing them without a cable bouncing around. Only 3 hours battery but normally long enough for me. I have taken the charging case and given them a boost when on a long trip (not ideal but did the job) lasted better sweat wise than any other set I've used so far (3 years guaranteed gives confidence on this side of things). A bit expensive but best set for training I've had so worth it for me!
customer_reviews.author: Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Good set of earphones with decent battery life
customer_reviews.text: Good set of earphones with decent battery life. They stay in the ear thanks to the eargels and I have had no problems with them fitting in the case which snaps shut. Not sure what others are complaining about.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Worth the asking price
customer_reviews.text: I needed reliable headphones which were waterproof. I use them for cycling and commuting. I tried other, cheaper versions before picking these up in a sale. They work reliably and connect quickly. The sound is excellent for my usage (mostly podcasts though with some music). The pass-through option allows me to communicate without having to take them out. They stay in the ears and are surprisingly comfortable. Then only reason they don't get 5 stars is you can't connect to two Bluetooth devices at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Vickers

customer_reviews.title: Better than Bose
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt these are the best BT earphones on the market for sports. The cost is pretty drastic but worth it. I've tried all sorts and these are far better than even the latest Bose offerings!
customer_reviews.author: Mr A Howles

customer_reviews.title: Better than Airpods
customer_reviews.text: Better than Airpods and the competition I've tried. Bought as an upgrade to my Jabra Pulse after trying Airpods and these are of course better than both.
customer_reviews.author: Ollie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones, regardless of non-sport use!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome wireless headphones, completely comfortable, rock solid wireless connection and excellent sound quality. As an example, I've left my iPhone in a seperate room, and wandered around 5 metres away, and continued to receive no issues with wireless break-up. Also fool proof to set-up! The recharging case is well designed, and gives you at least a couple of recharges without plugging it in. I haven't used them for 'sport' so I can't comment on the heart rate monitor, but I'd recommend these as your next set of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Daft

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality but the size of them takes some getting used to
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for a few months now. The battery life is great. About 3.5 hrs of music time. The little snuff box it comes with really gives it a premium feel. The only problem is the comfort/fit. I am used to wired ear phones and these were huge. It took a week or two to get used to and I was changing the buds and earwigs every few days to see if that was the problem. It is a good product and I recommend it but they become uncomfortable after a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Poor Jabra elite's Left me extremely disapointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought for driving and holiday. great idea, looked the part. Quite pricey, even more so when they don't charge, don't pair, don't fit well in the ear, are painful to wear, have no useful customer help worth a penny. Returned them as soon as possible to curry's who dont stock them anymore. Very disappointing. Gel seals are not worth a dime as they dont actually allow the little ear clip through the gel. were these actually product tested !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: carron

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time reading reviews and researching choices finally resting on these ear buds. They are very capable, the sound quality is excellent and with small ear canals I am very encouraged at how well they fit, impossible to shake out. I throughly recommend them, I'd give 5 stars if they were closer to £10" but having said that you do get a lot for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Hayden

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing on the whole
customer_reviews.text: Not a good experience. Will not connect reliably to iPhone. Mostly unreliable but then sometimes seem to work ok for a bit. I keep thinking I must be doing something wrong and I'll suddenly figure out the magic secret to making these work. More likely I'll bin them and try something better.
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: Have been using Jabra Sport Pulse for a while which I love, decided I wanted something truly wireless so invested in The Elite Sport pair, I use them regularly for the gym, amazing sound quality and so comfortable it is easy to forget you've got them in. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: EssBee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent couldn't do without them
customer_reviews.text: I had emergency heart surgery in march this year. I have been trying to get myself back to fit and found the hr on wrist is a bit hit and miss, chest strap was the same and uncomfortable due to the scar finger good but not practicle. So I got some of these they are great connect to my iPhone, I use zwift and the mobile link app connects it to zwift so I get my accurate hr on there while riding my wattbike i can now exercise in total confidence.
customer_reviews.author: JonnyC

product_meta.title: Jabra Elite Sport True Wireless Bluetooth Waterproof Fitness and Running Earbuds with Heart Rate and Activity Monitor Includes Advanced Charging Case - Black
product_meta.description:
The most technically advanced true wireless sports earbuds. Superior quality sound for calls and music. Comfortable and secure cord-free fit. Personalized fitness analysis and in-ear audio coaching. Compatible with Apple iOS and Android smartphones

BOX CONTAINS
Charging Case, micro USB cable, 3 sets of Silicon EarGels, 3 sets of Foam EarGels, 3 sets of EarWings, Quick Start Guide, Warranty- and Warning Leaflets
feature_bullets: Superior sound for music and calls
Features microphone sensitivity of -38 decibel/volt/pascal with microphone frequency range: 100 hertz to 10 kilohertz
Up to 4.5 hours continuous play time and also features a charging case which provides additional 2 full charges of up to 13.5 hours
Compatible with Apple iOS and Android smartphones

specifications.Customer reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
